episodes.title: The 'cult leader' priest who abused bikini-clad 'lycra nuns'
episodes.description:
Young and beautiful, they danced to the sound of acid-house music pumped out of 500-watt sound systems, beneath laser lights and surreal images projected all around them.

Bikini-clad go-go dancers, eyelids powdered, lips glossed, hip bones jutting – dressed in quintessential 1980s and 1990s fashion – lost themselves amid hundreds of fellow clubbers who had queued around the block just to get in.
But this night in Sheffield wasn’t a normal rave. This was a church service – the Nine O’Clock Service (NOS), led by the Rev Chris Brain between 1986 and 1995. 

Yet beneath the veneer of divine spirituality, Brain, 68, was a “Jekyll and Hyde” predator, sexually assaulting his victims. Thirty years after his evangelical movement collapsed in scandal, Brain finally appeared in the dock at the Inner London Crown Court.
#chrisbrain #news #religion 

Read more here: https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2025/08/21/chris-brain-priest-sexual-assault-church-of-england/
